description: A paginated call to get a list of all custom line items (FFLIs) for the given billing period. If you don't provide a billing period, the current billing period is used.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A ListCustomLineItemsFilter that specifies the custom line item names and/or billing group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve FFLI information. Names (list) --- A list of custom line items to retrieve information. (string) --- BillingGroups (list) --- The billing group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information. (string) --- Arns (list) --- A list of custom line item ARNs to retrieve information. (string) --- AccountIds (list) --- The Amazon Web Services accounts in which this custom line item will be applied to. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Names
nested_params.description: A list of custom line items to retrieve information.

nested_params.name: BillingGroups
nested_params.description: The billing group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information.

nested_params.name: Arns
nested_params.description: A list of custom line item ARNs to retrieve information.

nested_params.name: AccountIds
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts in which this custom line item will be applied to.

nested_items.name: CustomLineItems
nested_items.description: A list of FreeFormLineItemListElements received.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) for custom line items.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The custom line item's name.

nested_items.name: ChargeDetails
nested_items.description: A ListCustomLineItemChargeDetails that describes the charge details of a custom line item.

nested_items.name: ChargeValue
nested_items.description: The custom line item's fixed charge value in USD.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: A ListCustomLineItemPercentageChargeDetails that describes the charge details of a percentage custom line item.

nested_items.name: PercentageValue
nested_items.description: The custom line item's percentage value. This will be multiplied against the combined value of its associated resources to determine its charge value.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the custom line item that indicates whether the charge is a fee or credit.

nested_items.name: LineItemFilters
nested_items.description: A representation of the line item filter.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The attribute of the line item filter. This specifies what attribute that you can filter on.

nested_items.name: MatchOption
nested_items.description: The match criteria of the line item filter. This parameter specifies whether not to include the resource value from the billing group total cost.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values of the line item filter. This specifies the values to filter on. Currently, you can only exclude Savings Plan discounts.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The custom line item's charge value currency. Only one of the valid values can be used.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The custom line item's description. This is shown on the Bills page in association with the charge value.

nested_items.name: ProductCode
nested_items.description: The product code that's associated with the custom line item.

nested_items.name: BillingGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that references the billing group where the custom line item applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the custom line item was modified.

nested_items.name: AssociationSize
nested_items.description: The number of resources that are associated to the custom line item.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account in which this custom line item will be applied to.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to get custom line items (FFLIs).
